body:
Hey Everyone! I just wanted to let you know that Cacal is going to be hosting a party where we play some of the more non-played avicus maps. These will range from maps that are barely seen such as nexus maps, to some really random maps such as 50 shades of Illuminati. 

The event will start at 9 EST and every team will be invited. 

We will also take requests on maps that should be played so hope you are able to join us!

Thanks,
Cacalmarin!

title: Popular Map Party!

replies.body: It's avy's birthday, so don't forget to spam her with birthday wishes!
replies.body_tagged: It's avy's birthday, so don't forget to spam her with birthday wishes!

replies.body: Sounds fun, I'll try to attend.
replies.body_tagged: Sounds fun, I'll try to attend.

replies.body: How long until it starts? I dont translate times. Im too lazy
replies.body_tagged: How long until it starts? I dont translate times. Im too lazy

replies.body: The event has started! do /server scrim01! I have invited many of the popular teams to avicus, if you team is not invited just reply to this thread!
replies.body_tagged: The event has started! do /server scrim01! I have invited many of the popular teams to avicus, if you team is not invited just reply to this thread!

replies.body: So that's what the server was for lol, I overslept
